mapper.select: select agent.ID, agent.USER_ID, agent.URL, agent.DESCRIPTION, agent.CREATE_TIME, agent.UPDATE_TIME, agent.STATUS from D_AGENT_APPLY agent where agent.ID = #{id}

select agent.ID, IFNULL(agent.USER_ID,'') as USER_ID, IFNULL(agent.URL,'') as URL, IFNULL(agent.DESCRIPTION,'') as DESCRIPTION, IFNULL(agent.STATUS,'') as STATUS, IFNULL(date_format(agent.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as CREATE_TIME, IFNULL(date_format(agent.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as UPDATE_TIME, IFNULL(user.USER_NAME,'') as USER_NAME, IFNULL(user.PHONE,'') as PHONE, IFNULL(user.EMAIL_ADDRESS,'') as EMAIL_ADDRESS from D_AGENT_APPLY agent inner join D_USER user on agent.USER_ID = user.ID where agent.ID = #{id}

select agent.ID, IFNULL(agent.USER_ID,'') as USER_ID, IFNULL(agent.DESCRIPTION,'') as DESCRIPTION, IFNULL(agent.STATUS,'') as STATUS -- IFNULL(date_format(agent.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as CREATE_TIME, -- IFNULL(date_format(agent.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as UPDATE_TIME, -- IFNULL(user.USER_NAME,'') as USER_NAME, -- IFNULL(user.PHONE,'') as PHONE, -- IFNULL(user.EMAIL_ADDRESS,'') as EMAIL_ADDRESS from D_AGENT_APPLY agent where agent.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into D_AGENT_APPLY( USER_ID, URL, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, STATUS) values ( #{userId}, #{url}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{status} )
